title: Little Mix Just Opened Brits With A Fierce AF Performance
text:

ID: 10578210 2. They opened the show with a fierce AF performance of ‚ÄúShout Out to my Ex‚Äù, which everyone knows is a legitimate banger and the girl power anthem of the century. View this image ‚Ä∫
